pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Blesses the totem holder. Blessed provides extra armor as well as some innate damage resistance.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_of_amethyst)Totem of Amethyst$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 2$(br)$(l)Active/Passive:$() Passive$(br)$(l)Tier:$() High(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other passive totem augments.
